content: milda is a sweet little hat that is perfect for a first stranded colourwork project with four sizes you could make one for every member of your family **materials ** worsted weight yarn mc 30 40 50 60 yds / 27 37 46 55 m cc 60 70 80 100 yds / 55 64 73 91 m 4mm / us6 16 circular needle 4 5mm / us7 16 circular needle plus dpns **finished measurements ** to fit head circumference 16 18 20 22 / 41 46 51 56 cm shown in cascade 220 shades burgundy and dusty rose *errata after working chart pattern stated to break cc this should be break mc pattern updated 16/03/18 to reflect this *
